title: FREQUENTIS CANADA
author: ''
date: '2022-08-29'
slug: frequentis_canada
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.8M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with FREQUENTIS CANADA. The average
  contract duration was 1.21 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $701.3K.
  The longest contract was 5.37 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $4.2M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.8M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '18'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '7'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '39%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '108%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '3.29'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '3.1M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '1.21'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '701.3K'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '5.37'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '4.2M'
